name: BPA_FUP_RSH_STUDY
description: This table contains the research study used in the BPA follow-up.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the med alert record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: BPA_FUP_RSH_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the research study applied from the BPA.

columns.name: BPA_FUP_RSH_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the research study enrollment status applied from the BPA.

columns.name: BPA_FUP_RSH_MYC_YN
columns.description: BPA follow-up action of sending a research MyChart recruitment request

columns.name: ALT_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all alerts in the system.

columns.name: BPA_FUP_ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study association that has generated as a follow-up action for this BestPractice advisory.
